ScriptAction.Script:
Log("TUTORIAL_NOTE_ROUNDS1", tutorial_color)
Log("TUTORIAL_NOTE_DICE", tutorial_color)
Log("TUTORIAL_NOTE_ROUNDS2", tutorial_color)

local note_hit = false
local dummy = Creature("CR_TrainingDummy1")
local fight = Combat2()
fight:AddParticipant(Player)
fight:AddParticipant(dummy)
fight:OnRoundEnd(function(round)
    -- Once the dummy takes damage, show a quip
    if dummy.Health ~= dummy.HealthMax and not note_hit then
        note_hit = true
        Log("TUTORIAL_TALK3", tutorial_color)
    end
end)
fight:OnCreatureKilled(function(killer, victim)
    -- Ensure the hit text is displayed even if the dummy is OHKO'd
    if victim == dummy and not note_hit then
        Log("TUTORIAL_TALK3", tutorial_color)
    end
end)
fight:Begin()

Sleep(1)
Text.SetContext("instructor", instructor)
Log("TUTORIAL_TALK4")

Log("TUTORIAL_NOTE_GRAPPLE", tutorial_color)

local note_swallow = false
local note_digest = false
local dummy = Creature("CR_TrainingDummy2")
local fight = Combat2()
fight:AddParticipant(Player)
fight:AddParticipant(dummy)
fight:OnRoundEnd(function(round)
    if (not note_swallow) and fight:IsGrappling(Player) then
        -- Tutorial note
        note_swallow = true
        Log("TUTORIAL_NOTE_VORE1", tutorial_color)
        -- Enable swallowing
        dummy.Flags = dummy.Flags - ECharacterFlags.NoPrey
    end
    if (not note_digest) and fight:GetPredator(dummy) == Player then
        -- Tutorial note
        note_digest = true
        Log("TUTORIAL_NOTE_VORE2", tutorial_color)
    end
end)
fight:Begin()

Sleep(1)
Text.SetContext("instructor", instructor)
Log("TUTORIAL_TALK5")
